channel.title: How do I get dedi?
channel.description:
V sorry if this is in the wrong section :|
I really want to get dedi, I don't really care about the price but cheapest would be best. I've never had dedi and barely know what it is/how to get it.
My m8 says he's signed up to domain.com as a deluxe member or some shit and recons he can run my Server off that (But he doesn't know anything about RSPS) He said the site has something to do with Linux apparently which I heard has something to do with Dedi (again I have no fucking clue)
Can someone just run me through what I need to do exactly to get my Server 24/7 and would I need a good computer/internet to go with it?
Thanks - Billy Idol's first cousin

item.title: How do I get dedi?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Uhmm, lol. Okay. Idk about teeth.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get dedi?
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

sageofmali:

Yeah, or you can login into the domain and edit stuff.

Thanks man, another quick Q. When giving head should I use teeth?
I know alot of people don’t like it but my Dad’s tough.

Ofc I’m joking (not rly)
Just wanted to say thanks for the help. you’re the next ellen!

… Not rly, Nothing tops ellen, Unless it’s a bitch on top.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get dedi?
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

sageofmali:

Just upload your server files to the domain. Then run your server.

thanks I have another little Q though;

If my mates running it from his computer, Am I going to have to like get him to do anything anytime I want to update my Server?

Cheers

Read full topic
